WorkItem.Description:
When I try to start the latest version (v4.0.02) and try to load a character either from a file or battle.net, the program crashes with an error. I'm not sure what the error is however since no details are given.  When I go back to v4.0.01 it works fine.
Â 
Attached is the character file as well as the same character I tried to pull from battle.net. I did try to open another character (a pally and a mage) and that worked fine.  I opened another warrior character from battle.net in my guild and that worked fine as well.  I'm not too sure where the problem might be.

Comments.Message: Please read and follow the Posting Guidelines, we cannot help you with the (lack of) information you have provided.
Attached is the character file as well as the same character I tried to pull from battle.net.  I did try to open another character (a pally) and that worked fine.
Sorry Jothay.  I should have been more detailed.  Being a programmer myself, I should have known better.  I've edited the ticket with more details.

The actual error was a Stack Overflow. The GetBuffsStats was set up incorrectly with Kavan's new Set Bonus implementation, it would loop inside itself instead of calling the Base GetBuffsStats like it was supposed to.
